duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the go-to-market efforts for a fast-growing startup in the healthcare industry, defining new market strategies and ensuring success.
Manage and lead a team of Clinical Outreach Directors and Managers in a specific region, ensuring performance goals are met.
Measure and own KPIs across the region, reporting upwards on a monthly basis.
Develop and operationalize GTM strategy for efficient new market penetration.
Build and manage relationships with referral sources across priority markets.
Lead meetings with patients, parents, and providers to uncover needs and address barriers to treatment.
Design strategies to better support and engage referral partners across different channels.
Attend and lead various educational meetings, marketing presentations, and networking events.
Synthesize and share market feedback to inform go-forward marketing and product strategies.
Work closely with internal partners including marketing, product, client success, and legal to deliver on GTM goals.

education_certification.credential: 10+ years of business development experience, including 3+ years of experience in sales leadership. 5+ years of experience in behavioral health or healthcare. Bachelor's degree in related field (Master's preferred).
